title: Nullabor interlude
creator_credit: William M. Carty, Commonwealth Railways and Cinesound
brief_description: Two visitors from Britain travel across the Nullarbor Plain from Port Pirie to the “golden city” of Kalgoorlie in a luxurious air conditioned diesel electric train with music, good service and ever-changing colours of the desert. At small settlements along the line, they meet groups of local inhabitants, including First Nations people, and the Flying Doctor. Commentary by Tanya Halesworth.
